item.description:
Megan and Geoff are hosting their first Meetup!

They will have snacks and drinks (and pizza can be ordered). Please, bring your favorite games to play.

Parking is at the ferry landing off of Blaney Street -- lots of room there. Their home is on the third floor, and to get there, please use the back stairs. If you need more directions on the night of the event, please note the above listed number.

Megan and Geoff's is also home to two big, overly friendly dogs who will not be locked up. So, being dog friendly is a must.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Game Night as Megan and Geoff's
